verses.name: Job 17:7
verses.text: Mine eye also is dim by reason of sorrow, and all my members are as a shadow.

verses.name: Job 17:8
verses.text: Upright men shall be astonied at this, and the innocent shall stir up himself against the hypocrite.

verses.name: Job 17:9
verses.text: The righteous also shall hold on his way, and he that hath clean hands shall be stronger and stronger.

verses.name: Job 17:10
verses.text: But as for you all, do ye return, and come now: for I cannot find one wise man among you.

verses.name: Job 17:11
verses.text: My days are past, my purposes are broken off, even the thoughts of my heart.
